name: Sango Bay Serpent
shortLoreBlurb: Sango Bay Serpent is a spirit from Uganda/DRC associated with lake serpent, trade. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
overlapsLinks: Fafnir (Norse), Jörmungandr (Norse), Manannán (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Quetzalcoatl (Aztec), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Sango Bay Serpent is a spirit from Uganda/DRC associated with lake serpent, trade. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
